text: 4:11 Rom 12:7; 1 Korin 12:28; 2 Timoti 4:5Gumazir kamra a “bizir bar aghuiba pura gumazamizibagh anɨngi.” A bizir aghuir kaba me ganɨngi, marazi an aposelɨn ingangarim me ganɨngi. Marazi, a Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimɨn ingangarim me ganɨngi. Marazi, a Godɨn Akar Aghuim akunamin ingangarim me ganɨngi, marasi, a Godɨn gumazamizibar ganamin ingangarim me ganɨngi, egha marasi, gumazamiziba God ifongezir arazibar men sure damuamin ingangarim me ganɨngi.
